name: Quest-till-done
body:
# Quest Till Done
###A unified approach to software development

**QTD attempts to simplify code maintenance and competing priorities,
providing:**

A high level overview of all projects, their progress, and approaching deadlines

![]({{urls.media}}/overview.png)

An at a view glance of a project's progress, the relationship between issues, and current goals.

![]({{urls.media}}/tree.png)

And automated prioritization to allow programmers to focus on getting the work done rather than wading through a pile of issues

![]({{urls.media}}/priority.png)

##Project Details

For more information regarding the design and implementation of this project,
please consider the following:

[Open Source Github Repository](https://github.com/scheidm/quest-till-done)

[Software Requirements Specification]({{urls.media}}/QTDSRSFinal.pdf)

[Design Documentation]({{urls.media}}/QTDDesignDoc.pdf)

[Acceptance Test Plan]({{urls.media}}/QTDATPFinal.pdf)

[Live stats from development process on master branch]({http://drexelren.com:8080/stats/index.html})

[Public demo server, register and give it a try!]({http://drexelren.com:8080/users/sign_up})

##Project credits

This project was completed as part of the Drexel Computer Science Senior
Design competition, as the equivalent to a senior thesis.

###The QTD Team
- MK Chin
- Kevin Huang
- Mark Scheid

Robert Di Marco, [CTO of eLocal.com]({http://elocal.com})
